title: Get your SHIT Together!! Ranked is Not represantive anymore
body:
In my last game i got the message of the tribunal to overlook my activities, and start concerning my behavior, or i got to face consequences....
my point: Riot is not able to give me a stable and normal game experience, i am Playing since im 12 years old on multiplayer plattformers, but i NEVER Wittnessed such a bad community with such a lack of game spirit; every 5 games in average i got a AFK- Player, IN ranked mode; which should be a represantive of your skills, which is at this point Not; U DO NOT have a bot replacing system if some1 looses connection or intanionally goes AFK; at this rate AFK players u are barely doing a restictive job leaving it most to community and bots, but not to moderates who are in love and involved with this game, like its been a good decision on most multiplayer with dedicated servers....

As a provider of an game with this many people it aint easy to keep the black sheeps outa the herd, but its still your job to keep the experience up or at least constant, and by this community, no bot replacment; no Laning pick before the champion select; which would resolve 50% of the game conflicts if u make the player choose before they go into the champ select on which fukking lane they would like to play; make it changeable but u still get at least 50% of the conflicts out of the way!!!
Pls Get your Shit together RIOT, keep the AFK' Players out, give us bots if some1 aint capable of having time for a full round; and last but not least make the players Pick LAnes and champs differently; its supposed to be fun at everytime

regards; 
Pfox
